name: Trend Micro Vision One for Splunk SOAR
description: Trend Micro Vision One is a purpose-built threat defense platform that provides added value and new benefits beyond XDR solutions, allowing you to see more and respond faster. Providing deep and broad extended detection and response (XDR) capabilities that collect and automatically correlate data across multiple security layers—email, endpoints, servers, cloud workloads, and networks—Trend Micro Vision One prevents the majority of attacks with automated protection

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
actions.verbose: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration.

actions.description: Gather information about an endpoint
actions.verbose: Gather information about an endpoint.

ip_hostname_mac.description: Hostname/IP/MAC/AgentGuid of the endpoint(s) to query. (Required)
ip_hostname_mac.name: ip_hostname_mac

actions.description: Quarantine the endpoint
actions.verbose: Quarantine the endpoint.

endpoint_identifiers.description: Object containing endpoint (hostname) and description or agent_guid and description. (Required)
endpoint_identifiers.name: endpoint_identifiers

actions.description: Unquarantine the endpoint
actions.verbose: Unquarantine the endpoint.

endpoint_identifiers.description: Object containing endpoint (hostname) and description or agent_guid and description. (Required)
endpoint_identifiers.name: endpoint_identifiers

actions.description: Callback action for the on_poll ingest functionality
actions.verbose: Callback action for the on_poll ingest functionality.

starttime.description: Make sure time format matches following example. 2020-06-15T10:00:00Z
starttime.name: starttime

endtime.description: Make sure time format matches following example. 2020-06-15T12:00:00Z
endtime.name: endtime

actions.description: Checks the status of a task
actions.verbose: Checks the status of a particular task.

task_id.description: ID of the task you would like to get the status of. (Required)
task_id.name: task_id

poll.description: If script should wait until the task is finished before returning the result, enabled by default
poll.name: poll

poll_time_sec.description: Maximum time to wait for the result to be available
poll_time_sec.name: poll_time_sec

actions.description: Adds an item to the Suspicious Objects list in Vision One
actions.verbose: Adds an item from the Trend Micro Vision One Suspicious Objects list.

block_objects.description: Object made up of object_type (domain,ip,file_sha1,url,sender_mail_address), object_value and description. (Required)
block_objects.name: block_objects

actions.description: Removes an item from the Suspicious Objects list
actions.verbose: Removes an item from the Trend Micro Vision One Suspicious Objects list.

block_objects.description: Object made up of object_type (domain,ip,file_sha1,url,sender_mail_address), object_value and description. (Required)
block_objects.name: block_objects

actions.description: Quarantine the email message
actions.verbose: Retrieve data from the quarantine email message and send the result to dashboard.

email_identifiers.description: Email Message ID (<mailMsgId>), Mailbox ID and description or Unique Message ID (msgUuid) and description from Trend Micro Vision One message activity data. (Required)
email_identifiers.name: email_identifiers

actions.description: Delete the email message
actions.verbose: Retrieve data from the delete email message and relay result to Splunk.

email_identifiers.description: Email Message ID (<mailMsgId>), Mailbox ID and description or Unique Message ID (msgUuid) and description from Trend Micro Vision One message activity data. (Required)
email_identifiers.name: email_identifiers

actions.description: Terminate the process running on the endpoint
actions.verbose: Terminate the process running on the endpoint and send results to the dashboard.

process_identifiers.description: Object consisting of endpoint (hostname) or agent_guid, file_sha1, filename and description. (Required)
process_identifiers.name: process_identifiers

actions.description: Add object to exception list
actions.verbose: Add the exception object to the exception list and send the result to Splunk.

block_objects.description: Object consisting of object_type (domain,ip,url,file_sha1,file_sha256,sender_mail_address), object_value and description. (Required)
block_objects.name: block_objects

actions.description: Delete object from exception list
actions.verbose: Delete the exception object from the exception list and relay data to Splunk.

block_objects.description: Object consisting of object_type (domain,ip,url,file_sha1,file_sha256,sender_mail_address) and object_value. (Required)
block_objects.name: block_objects

actions.description: Add suspicious object to suspicious list
actions.verbose: Add suspicious object to suspicious list and send the result to dashboard.

block_objects.description: Object consisting of object_type (domain,ip,url,file_sha1,file_sha256,sender_mail_address), object_value and scan_action, risk_level, expiry_days and description. (Required)
block_objects.name: block_objects

actions.description: Delete the suspicious object from suspicious list
actions.verbose: Delete the suspicious object from suspicious list and send the result to the dashboard.

block_objects.description: Object consisting of object_type (domain,ip,url,file_sha1,file_sha256,sender_mail_address) and object_value. (Required)
block_objects.name: block_objects

actions.description: Get the status of file analysis based on task id
actions.verbose: Get the status of file analysis based on task id and send result to the dashboard.

task_id.description: ID generated from the start_analysis action. Submission ID in Vision One. (Required)
task_id.name: task_id

actions.description: Get the analysis report of a file based on report id
actions.verbose: Get the analysis report of a file based on report id and send the results to the dashboard.

submit_id.description: ID of the sandbox submission retrieved from check_analysis_status action. (Required)
submit_id.name: submit_id

poll.description: If script should wait until the task is finished before returning the result, enabled by default
poll.name: poll

poll_time_sec.description: Maximum time to wait for the result to be available
poll_time_sec.name: poll_time_sec

actions.description: Collect forensic file
actions.verbose: Collect forensic file and send result to the dashboard.

collect_files.description: Object containing endpoint (hostname) or agent_guid, file_path and description. (Required)
collect_files.name: collect_files

actions.description: Get the download information for collected forensic file
actions.verbose: Get the download information for collected forensic file and send the result to the dashboard.

task_id.description: Task ID output from collect_forensic_file action. (Required)
task_id.name: task_id

poll.description: If script should wait until the task is finished before returning the result, enabled by default
poll.name: poll

poll_time_sec.description: Maximum time to wait for the result to be available
poll_time_sec.name: poll_time_sec

actions.description: Submit file to sandbox for analysis
actions.verbose: Submit file to sandbox for analysis and send the result to the dashboard.

file_url.description: URL pointing to the location of the file to be submitted. (Required)
file_url.name: file_url

file_name.description: Name of the file to be analyzed. (Required)
file_name.name: file_name

document_pass.description: The password for decrypting the submitted document. The value must be Base64-encoded. The maximum password length is 128 bytes prior to encoding. (Optional)
document_pass.name: document_pass

archive_pass.description: The password for decrypting the submitted archive. The value must be Base64-encoded. The maximum password length is 128 bytes prior to encoding. (Optional)
archive_pass.name: archive_pass

arguments.description: Parameter that allows you to specify Base64-encoded command line arguments to run the submitted file. The maximum argument length before encoding is 1024 bytes. Arguments are only available for Portable Executable (PE) files and script files. (Optional)
arguments.name: arguments

actions.description: Adds a note to an existing workbench alert
actions.verbose: Adds a note to an existing workbench alert in Trend Micro Vision One.

workbench_id.description: Workbench id of security incident in Vision One. (Required)
workbench_id.name: workbench_id

content.description: Note to be added to workbench event. (Required)
content.name: content

actions.description: Updates the status of an existing workbench alert
actions.verbose: Updates the status of an existing workbench alert in Trend Micro Vision One.

workbench_id.description: The ID of the workbench alert that you would like to update the status for. (Required)
workbench_id.name: workbench_id

status.description: The status to assign to the workbench alert: new, in_progress, true_positive, false_positive, benign_true_positive, closed. (Required)
status.name: status

if_match.description: Target resource will be updated only if it matches ETag of the target one. Etag is one of the outputs from get_alert_details. (Required)
if_match.name: if_match

actions.description: Displays information about the specified alert
actions.verbose: Displays information about the specified alert.

workbench_id.description: ID of the workbench alert you would like to get the details for. (Required)
workbench_id.name: workbench_id

actions.description: Submits URLs to the sandbox for analysis
actions.verbose:
Submits URLs to the sandbox for analysis. You can submit a maximum of 10 URLs per request. For more information about the supported URL format, see https://docs.trendmicro.com/en-us/enterprise/trend-micro-xdr-help/SandboxAnalysis.
Note: Using Sandbox Analysis requires credits.

urls.description: List of URLs to be sent to sandbox for analysis. Note: You can submit a maximum of 10 URLs per request. (Required)
urls.name: urls

actions.description: Allows the user to sign in to new application and browser sessions
actions.verbose:
Allows the user to sign in to new application and browser sessions.
Supported IAM systems:
Azure AD
Active Directory (on-premises).

actions.description: Signs the user out of all active application and browser sessions, and prevents the user from signing in any new session
actions.verbose:
Signs the user out of all active application and browser sessions, and prevents the user from signing in any new session.
Supported IAM systems:
Azure AD
Active Directory (on-premises).

actions.description: Restore quarantined email messages
actions.verbose:
Restore quarantined email messages

Account role permissions required:
Response Management
View, filter, and search (Task List tab)
Quarantine/Restore messages.

email_identifiers.description: Email Message ID (<mailMsgId>), Mailbox ID and description or Unique Message ID (msgUuid) and description from Trend Micro Vision One message activity data. (Required)
email_identifiers.name: email_identifiers

actions.description: Signs the user out of all active application and browser sessions
actions.verbose:
Signs the user out of all active application and browser sessions.
Supported IAM systems:
Azure AD.

actions.description: Signs the user out of all active application and browser sessions, and forces the user to create a new password during the next sign-in attempt
actions.verbose:
Signs the user out of all active application and browser sessions, and forces the user to create a new password during the next sign-in attempt.
Supported IAM systems:
Azure AD
Active Directory (on-premises).

poll_time_sec.description: Maximum time to wait for the result to be available

actions.verbose: Displays the analysis results of the specified object.

poll.description: If script should wait until the task is finished before returning the result, enabled by default
poll.name: poll

poll_time_sec.description: Maximum time to wait for the result to be available

actions.description: Downloads the Investigation Package of the specified object
actions.verbose: Downloads the Investigation Package of the specified object using the unique alphanumeric string that identifies the analysis results of a submission.

submit_id.description: Unique alphanumeric string that identifies the analysis results of a submission. (Required)

poll.description: If script should wait until the task is finished before returning the result, enabled by default
poll.name: poll

poll_time_sec.description: Maximum time to wait for the result to be available
poll_time_sec.name: poll_time_sec

actions.description: Retrieves information about domains, file SHA-1, file SHA-256, IP addresses, email addresses, or URLs in the Suspicious Object List and displays the information in a paginated list
actions.verbose: Retrieves information about domains, file SHA-1, file SHA-256, IP addresses, email addresses, or URLs in the Suspicious Object List and displays the information in a paginated list.
